subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Nikolay Davydenko defeated a tired Andy Murray, 7-5, 6-2, to advance to the Masters Cup final Sunday in Shanghai. Davydenko will meet Novak Djokovic in the final of this season-ending tournament. Djokovic rallied to oust Gilles Simon, 4-6, 6-3, 7-5.
snippet: Nikolay Davydenko defeated a tired Andy Murray, 7-5, 6-2, to advance to the Masters Cup final Sunday in Shanghai. Davydenko will meet Novak Djokovic in the final of this season-ending tournament. Djokovic rallied to oust Gilles Simon, 4-6, 6-3, 7-5.
